dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Put the case down, Ana, Rip trains his gun on Storm Shadow.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: And you get out of that...thing. Stalemate. Storm Shadow doesn't move. Ana turns and looks at Duke. Sets the case down, her voice is gentle.

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: Fine. Done. Then she takes a step toward Duke.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Stop, Ana. Stop right there. But she doesn't. She just keeps slowly moving toward him.

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: You can't shoot me, can you?

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: I will if I have to.

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: Deep down, you're still the same man I fell in love with.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Don't force this, Ana.

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: What could have been, right, Duke? You beside your best man. Me walking down the aisle.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Don't listen to her, Duke. (a thought) Was I really going to be your best man?

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: (cocking the pistol) Don't make me do this god-damnit!

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: "Don't make me do this?" A recurring theme in your life, right Duke? She takes another step. Duke levels his pistol right at h forehead. Storm Shadow flinches. Duke gives him a glance.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Move and I'll blow her away. (to Ripcord) Get the briefcase. Ana takes another step forward, daring Duke to pull the trigger. Ripcord, gun drawn and fixed on Storm Shadow, mo slowly forward to retrieve the briefcase. Ana is now an i from the extended barrel. Ana and Duke are close enough t feel each other's breath. Their eyes lock.

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: Do it, Duke. .You already killed me once. And in Duke's eyes we see him falter, just a bit. Ripcord passes Ana, and wit hone lightning quick hand she slaps a Duke's pistol. AN ERRANT SHOT GOES OFF. Storm Shadow lung at ripcord, SLICING his pistol in half with one sword and about to kill him with the other. When suddenly, Snake-Eyes lunges INTO FRAME. CLANG! Snake Eyes' KATANA BLADE saves Ripcord's life by a half inch. The rest of the Neo-Vipers arrive and immediately open fi pinning both Duke and Ripcord down. All hell breaks loose Snake-Eyes and Storm Shadow lunge at one another, swords flashing at impossible speeds, then they lock swords. Fac to-face, staring hard into each other's eyes.
Snake-Eyes glances at Storm Shadow's right forearm, spott the same RED MARKINGS of his ninja clan underneath his su sleeve. This shocks the hell out of Snake-Eyes. Storm Shadow smiles.

dialogues.speaker: STORM SHADOW
dialogues.text: (CYNICAL)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello brother. Snake-Eyes looks shocked. Storm Shadow uses the moment to elbow him in the face, knocking him hard to the ground. A grabs the weapons case as Scarlett rushes in, aiming her CROSSBOW PISTOL.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: I believe you've got my luggage. Ana stares at Scarlett, then quick-draws a PULSE PISTOL. shot tears the CROSSBOW PISTOL out of Scarlett's hands. Ana's got her dead-to-rights until Scarlett triggers her SUIT, melting into nothing right in front of Ana. Ana doesn't spot the RIPPLES OF AIR around her until she' stuck hard. The case goes flying. Another SMACK and her pistol is knocked free. Ana grabs a second pistol, but that's just as quickly twisted out of her grasp and dropp Ana fights the invisible Scarlett as best she can, but Scarlett lands several unseen blows on her. Ripcord and Duke take out a pair of Neo-Vipers. Storm Sha climbs back into the Arclight. Looking at ana as she fall near a vehicle on the blocks. Ana grabs an OIL PAN and flings the oil, which sprays over everything, including Scarlett, making her visible. Ana leaps on Scarlett, knoc her to the ground and angrily begins to choke the life ou her. Storm Shadow ignites the Arclight which jumps into the ai powered by an arc of blue light shooting out of its engin pack. He quickly swoops towards the two women and grabs a by her arm, pulling her along. Ana grabs the weapons case and they soar up out of the motor pool and over the landi pad. The battle raging below them. Ripcord and Duke fire after them, but they vanish up into next level. Heavy Duty, now back in action, takes out the last of the Neo-Vipers. Snake-Eyes checks on Scarlett who nursing her neck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ana climbs to Storm Shadow as the rocket up to the SECURI ROOM WINDOW and BLAST it out of their way. SHATTER CITY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They fly into the security room and quickly dispatch the technicians still alive. Ana his the large switch on the console and the huge door begins to spiral open. She jump back into Storm Shadow's arms and they blast back out--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --and fly up through the hole where their Typhoon gunship rockets up. They fly in through a door as four Joe ANTI- AIRCRAFT TURRETS spring out of the sand, firing away at t Typhoon as it speeds away into the dark desert night...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dawn light shimmers across the reflecting pool, the Linco Memorial, the Washington Monument. SUPER: WASHINGTON D.C.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The AMERICAN PRESIDENT quickly but quietly closes the doo his bedroom, throwing on a robe, he charges down a corrid trailed by his STAFF and BODYGUARDS. One of the staffers hands the President a report which he skims through.

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: How many warheads?

dialogues.speaker: STAFFER
dialogues.text: Four, Mr. President.

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: Any threats? Any demands?

dialogues.speaker: STAFFER
dialogues.text: None so far, sir.

dialogues.speaker: STAFFER
dialogues.text: We take this to mean the terrorists are unfocused, no clear goals. The President stops, glancing gravely back at his staff.

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: No, .it means they're going to use them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: opening. Ana McCullen gazes a the IRON MASK we and Storm Sh saw his ance adow watc in the h onndual HOLOstor PROJECTORS. This belonged jo E mine. He was c t an old ancestor o f to both sides. aught sellin g arms They forced wear it the rest to his life .

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: Why do you keep at it? So that I MCCULLENne ver forget the most important rul e in dealing arms. Never sell to STORM SHADOWboth sides?

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: Never get caught. McCullen carefully puts the mask back in its ca se.

dialogues.speaker: CONT'D
dialogues.text: Take the warheads N ( to them wea Paris. Have ized. Then to test pon one. I want you Test one?ANA

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: I don't wan t you until leaving Paris that they've you;re sure that the work, been properly y weaponized. (SMILES)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll let CNN show everyone how w ell they perform. (loses the smile) I want them to fear me. It will be STORM SHADOWdone.

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: I have a target french will never in mind, one the forget. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: As I have never forgotten what the French did to Clan McCullen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the shadowy operating chamber, the Doctor approaches Zartan who sits on a gurney, scanning his PDA. Dozens of SMART ROBOTS warm up as the Doctor flicks on switches.

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR
dialogues.text: Are you ready, Mr. Zartan?

dialogues.speaker: ZARTAN
dialogues.text: This is going to be the achievement of a lifetime.

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR
dialogues.text: For you and me both.

dialogues.speaker: ZARTAN
dialogues.text: Eighteen months of studying the subject, learning the mannerisms, adopting his eating habits, losing sixty percent of my muscle mas...

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR
dialogues.text: Your commitment has been inspiring. McCullen enters.

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: Gentlemen. About to get under way? Zartan raises his PDA.

dialogues.speaker: ZARTAN
dialogues.text: Once the ledgers are all square.

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: Check your account. Zartan checks the PDA. McCullen shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: It's always about the money.

dialogues.speaker: ZARTAN
dialogues.text: It's a useful tool. You should understand that. Ah! The transfer just hit my account. Zartan puts the PDA aside, leans back on the gurney and CRACKS HIS KNUCKLES.

dialogues.speaker: ZARTAN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Let's do this. The Doctor straps Zartan down, then starts the SMART ROBO which converge on Zartan, injecting his body with dozens long needles. He remains conscious, not feeling any pain. WE ZOOM into a LARGE NEEDLE which OPENS an INCISION behin his right ear. The needle feeds thousands of tiny NANO-MI into Zartan's head. Zartan's eyes bulge, he starts to SCR and fight his restraints as the nano-mites begin to resha his appearance, reforming facial bones and changing the texture and elasticity of his skin and even changing the color of his eyes. The Doctor grins proudly. McCullen loo disturbed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Joes are busy cleaning up the mess. Snake-Eyes sits by himself, hasn't moved in several hours. A thousand yard stare in his eyes. AND WE FLASHBACK TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A TEN YEAR OLD FRENCH ORPHAN BOY, cold from the rain and desperately hungry, scavenges for food in a garbage can, looks up and notices a warm light coming from the other s of a wall and gate MARKED WITH RED CLAN MARKINGS. INSIDE THE TEMPLE: Young Snake Eyes sneaks in through the Kitchen window and goes to a rice pot on the counter. As takes a first bite, another young boy enters, we see the CLAN MARKINGS on his forearm, it's a young Storm Shadow, healthy, wealthy, and well fed.

dialogues.speaker: YOUNG STORM SHADOW
dialogues.text: Thief ! He picks up the KITCHEN KNIFE and tries to cut Young Snak Eyes, who blocks the strike with the rice pot. They fight fiercely for two little kids, using all sorts of utensils furniture. Snake-Eyes has desperate street skills, but St Shadow's classic training gives him the edge. He finally traps Snake-Eyes under his foot, a triumphant look on his face. He starts to choke Snake-Eyes with his foot ...

dialogues.speaker: HARD MASTER, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: (Japanese, subtitled) Enough! Storm Shadow! A Ninja Master steps forward. Storm Shadow turns to him.

dialogues.speaker: YOUNG STORM SHADOW
dialogues.text: (Japanese, subtitled) Father, he was stealing. We need to call the magistrate.

dialogues.speaker: HARD MASTER
dialogues.text: (Japanese, subtitled) He is hungry. We need to invite him in and show him the way.

dialogues.speaker: STORM SHADOW
dialogues.text: He's a cur! A Frenchie!

dialogues.speaker: HARD MASTER
dialogues.text: He doesn't fight like one. The two young warriors glare at one another.

dialogues.speaker: HARD MASTER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (Japanese, subtitled) Now what shall be your clan name? Snake-Eyes glares up at Storm Shadow, narrowing his eyes furiously. Hard Master just smiles, AHl AND WE FLASH BACK TO: Snake-Eyes in the motor pool, he st up and walk off...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Battered and bruised, Scarlett hurriedly enters the barra Checks around to see that she's alone. Then she heads for mirror over one of the sinks, peeling back her collar to check the CHOKE MARKS on her neck. Her hands are tremblin She turns on the water and cleans her face with a WASH CL Ripcord enters the barracks behind. Like Scarlett, he loo around to see if he's alone. He catches Scarlett looking him in the mirror, as if he's unwanted. Then he notices t choke marks. He is genuinely concerned.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Jesus, you okay?

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: I'm fine.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: You're not fine, let me look at that.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: I looked at it, it's fine.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Take it easy, just trying to help.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: I know what you're trying to do.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: And what is that exactly?

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: I don't have time for this.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: You know, not every guy you meet is an asshole. You do know that, don't you? Scarlett stops and returns to the sink, he ignores her, cleaning the blood off his face. She softens.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: It's not you, I... I didn't really want anyone to... see me in here.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Why not?

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: I don't know. All the people we lost last night. General Hawk... My neck is not that important.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: You almost died. You're allowed to be concerned.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: First fight I've lost since I was a kid. My father would be... he was my instructor.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Think he's be disappointed.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: He taught me to win.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: I don't know how you teach anybody to win at everything every time. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: But I do know you can teach someone to get up when they get knocked down. Ripcord turn her gently in the mirror.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Look at you. Still here. Maybe this is what he wanted you to learn. Scarlett stares at her reflection briefly.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: But of course, that would be an emotional response, one that can't be explained or quantified. Ripcord turns and heads for the door. Scarlett watches hi

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: We're not a couple. Snake-Eyes and me. We're... close, he's like a brother, but... we're not a couple. Ripcord looks back at her, nods, then walks on out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hawk is hooked up to a LIFE SUPPORT MACHINE. Duke sits nearby, his shoulder being bandaged by a Medical Officer. PUSH IN ON Duke's eyes, staring into oblivion, AND FLASHB

dialogues.speaker: HAWK
dialogues.text: Can you kill her? And then WE FLASHBACK TO: Ana strangling Scarlett, a smil her face. Squeezing harder, harder. Pure evil.

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: (PRELAP)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That ought to hold you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Duke "comes to" as the Doctor finishes and walks away. Du takes a breath, looks to Hawk in his bed, then stands and walks over. He stares down at Hawk, then, a promise--

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Graveyard dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Duke, Ripcord, Scarlett, Snake-Eyes, and Heavy Duty stare some next-gen computerized ultra-sound PHOTOSTATS of a de Neo-Viper. Snake-Eyes points in question to an area.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Nano-mites. I wrote my thesis on the theory behind them at Oxford. They've been surgically implanted behind the ear, all programmed to accomplish different tasks.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Like what?

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Theoretically, the possibilities are endless. Increase their speed, agility, resilience. You program, they perform. That's the genius of nanotechnology, it can do pretty much whatever you want it to.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Mind control?

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: I don't see why not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Duke and Ripcord move with the others through a corridor.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Their weaponry, financing, intel, it has to be McCullen. Doing an inside job on his own warheads.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: You may be right. Maybe he needed NATO to pay for his R D.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: The weapons case! Everyone stops and looks at Ripcord like he's nuts.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Remember he had us open the case for him. Remember that?

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: What about it?

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: I'll bet that code he gave us like re-activated the tracking beacon or something. Looks pass among the group, it starts to make sense.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: And who says you're not a thinker. All of the sudden, Breaker rushes up to them, out of brea

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: I think I found her...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Breaker leads the group into the control room where a WED PHOTO OF ANA AND DeCobray is up on screen. Duke stares at photo, gazing at her face. Ripcord sees her and knows, to

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Yeah, you found her all right.

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: Her name is Ana DeCobray now, Baroness if you're feeling formal.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Wow, she traded up, huh? (off Duke's look) I mean... financially.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Who is he?

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: Baron DeCobray. Big shot French scientist. Runs a lab in Paris.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Lab? Breaker call up an image of DeCobray standing in front of huge PARTICLE ACCELERATOR along with some other scientist

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: Particle accelerator.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: They're gonna use him to weaponize the warheads.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: That's where she's going.

dialogues.speaker: HEAVY DUTY
dialogues.text: Who likes croissants?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then a lighted aircraft in the distance approaches at Mach three. It's the Howler.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joes are silent, eyes ahead. Scarlett shares a smile Ripcord, next to her, Across from them Duke watches, almo smiles, then lays back his head and closes his eyes. AND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAMERA PANS AROUND a village choked by thick jungle as EXPLOSIONS erupt in SLO-MO and a BLACKHAWK circles, ROTOR beating hypnotically, giving the images a dreamlike quali

dialogues.speaker: INT. BLACKHAWK HELICOPTER, DAWN
dialogues.text: Duke, Ripcord, Rex, and the rest of an insertion team, si with their backs against the chopper walls.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Per the briefing, we fast rope in, form up and assault the main lab... (a glance at Rex) Rex--uh, .the science officer, stays back with Fireteam Alpha until Bravo enters and secures the building. Alpha holds the perimeter while science officer secures the WMDs. Five minutes before extraction and the airstrike. The squad nods. Duke looks to Rex again. Rex is sweating, trying not to s it. Duke hands him a piece of gum.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Double Bubble? Rex takes it. Duke blows a bubble, smiles at Rex.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Always helps me. You good?

dialogues.speaker: REX
dialogues.text: (weak smile back) Yeah... They chew their gum.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOWN IN THE VILLAGE: Duke leads a frontal assault of the building. They take fire from some GUARDS, but put them d Other GUARDS flee. The way to the door is cleared. Duke g hand signals along with his commands.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Go, Bravo. Bravo, a TWO-MAN fire team hit the door of the building. disappear inside. Rex, a kit bag over his shoulder and a .45 Colt ACP on hi hip, waits in a crouch, Duke next to him puts a hand on h shoulder. Duke scans the treeline for any treats. One of Bravo Team appears in the doorway and signals "ALL CLEAR." Duke double taps Rex on the shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You're good to go, Rex. You don't find it in four minutes, get out of there, because that house won't be standing in five. I already called for the air strike. Rex nods. Duke gives him a smile. Rex takes off and runs to the door, entering the house. Duke watches him go, the looks back to the jungle and hears the WHUMP of mortars. takes one more look, Rex disappears safely inside, then t mortar rounds start to hit. The ground is torn apart, dirt flying in the air, as Duke Rip and the rest of the squad takes cover. We catch glimpses of the enemy, lots of them, in the jung firing. Duke and Ripcord pop up and return fire.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: I've gotta level with ya!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: I hate it when you level with me.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Gonna be a long five minutes. Duke just grits his teeth and keeps firing. Then, in the distance, RUMBLING coming from the sonic roar of JETS.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I love that sound... But then he looks to Duke, confusion on his face.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: No, no, no... It's too soon. ANGLE ON: The F-16s in formation streaking toward them ac the sky. Duke looks back at the main building.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Rex. Duke runs for the building. Tracer fire and mortar explos all around him. Then the whistle of a bunker buster. Duke dives and BOOM! The building is flattened by the bomb. Du is tossed through the air like a rag doll. Lands hard, ba registers the pain, staggers up, bloody and ripped, stumb toward the smoking. Flaming rubble that was the building. The Blackhawk comes sweeping low, ready for extraction, t tracer fire and explosions intensify. Black smoke washes Duke. Ripcord finds him in the debris.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Blackhawk's waiting. Come on, we've got wounded! And incoming enemy! Lots of 'em!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: I can't.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Nothing you can do. Come on...! Gunfire bursts around them as Ripcord pulls Duke away fro the ruins of the house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TIGHT ON Duke's haunted, soot-streaked face as his eyes t on a thousand-yard stare. AND WE CUT BACK TO THE PRESENT:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Duke is wide awake, his eyes have on a thousand-yard star

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Paris by day, the Eiffel Tower in all her glory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ana's SCARAB ATTACK TRUCK pulls up to a GUARD SHED outsid large building which is surrounded by an ELECTRIFIED FENC SECURITY GUARD steps out of the shed and taps on the driv window. The Neo-Viper behind the wheel lowers the BACKSEA WINDOW, revealing Ana and Storm Shadow in the back. The g smiles at Ana. They speak in French, subtitled.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY GUARD
dialogues.text: Good Morning. Baroness.

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: Good morning. Gene. My husband's expecting me.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY GUARD
dialogues.text: Absolument. The Security Guard opens the ELECTRONIC GATE and the Scar drives up to the building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two SECURITY GUARDS look up from their desks as Ana and S Shadow stride through the DOORS with two Neo-Vipers. Stor Shadow throws something. Both guards fall dead. THROWING STARS in their heads. The Neo-Vipers steal behind the des throw a switch, open a LOCKED DOOR for Ana and Storm Shad

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ana and Storm Shadow enter a colossal chamber which is al but consumed by the PARTICLE ACCELERATOR.

LAB TECHNICIANS swarm all over it, taking readings and ma adjustments, under the eyes of DeCobray who sits at a con station surrounded by monitors. Ana gives the weapons cas Storm Shadow who hangs back as she walks up to her husban

dialogues.speaker: DECOBRAY
dialogues.text: Ana...?

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: I need you to do something for me and I don't have much time.

dialogues.speaker: DECOBRAY
dialogues.text: (sees Storm Shadow) Who is this? She beckons Storm Shadow who sets the weapons case down o DeCobray's desk, opening it up to reveal the four NANOTEC WARHEADS and their launchers. DeCobray stares, bewildered

dialogues.speaker: DECOBRAY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I don't understand... what are these things? What's going on?

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: They're warheads, dear. And I need you to weaponize them for me... (looking around) .or we'll kill everyone in here. DeCobray stares at her, shocked. He looks at Storm Shadow removes a GLOCK PISTOL from his belt and shoots a TECHNIC Chaos erupts. DeCobray shouts to the room, calming the ot somewhat. He stares at Ana and Storm Shadow, terrified.

dialogues.speaker: DECOBRAY
dialogues.text: This is a civilian laboratory. We don't have the correct programming protocols for weaponizing...

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: The protocols are in the case. (he hesitates) I told you, I don't have much time. DeCobray reluctantly takes the weapons case.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A BRAWLER charges through the streets. On the outside it looks like your Uncle's R.V, but inside it's all next-gen

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heavy Duty drives the Brawler while Breaker mans a hi-tec terminal next to him. In the back, Snake-Eyes loads his g while Scarlett, Duke, and Ripcord put on ACCELERATOR SUIT

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Heavy D and Breaker will stay in the Brawler, watch our back. The rest of us will break into the lab with the accelerator suits. Once the warheads are weaponized, they'll be extremely volatile. We can't afford to let any of them go off inside the city. Ripcord looks at Snake-Eyes.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: What about you? Don't you get a suit? Snake-Eyes just looks at him, "Are you kidding me?"

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: He doesn't need one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A TREMENDOUS WHINE echoes through the chamber as the part accelerator come to life, HUMMING evenly. Storm Shadow ba up a little. Ana glances at him. He shrugs, what? Technic quickly finish up and back away from the accelerator.

dialogues.speaker: DECOBRAY
dialogues.text: Firing. DeCobray hits a switch. The PARTICLE ACCELERATOR charges begins hurling atoms through miles and miles of undergrou tunnels. Inside the accelerator, the four warheads begin spin in a GLASS VACUUM CHAMBER -- then, as the power grow they begin to rise, each one hovering as they spin. Ana and Storm Shadow watch with mild curiosity as the noi inside the chamber builds. The atoms catapulting faster a faster through the tunnels, bombarding the warheads again again. Until finally, a LOUD BOOM rings out. And the warh slowly sink back down and stop spinning. DeCobray keys another button and the GLASS VACUUM CHAMBER emerges from the accelerator.
Technicians open the chamber and very carefully remove th warheads, returning them to their case. Storm Shadow lock the case and picks it up.

dialogues.speaker: DECOBRAY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Careful... they're alive.

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: Thank you, Leon.

dialogues.speaker: DECOBRAY
dialogues.text: I think I have never seen the face of evil until I looked at you now. Ana looks at him and falters, something in his words pier her hard veneer. She feels Storm Shadow watching her and with a flick of her eyes, the walls go up again. She drop SEALED ENVELOPE on DeCobray's desk and heads for the door

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: Adieu. DeCobray watches her go, then opens the envelope. We see LARGE HEADER printed on the first page: "ACCORD DE DIVORC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Brawler races up towards the lab, they see it out the forward windows.

dialogues.speaker: HEAVY DUTY
dialogues.text: There it is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ana and Storm Shadow emerge from the lab and climb into t back of the Scarab as the two Neo-Vipers climb in the fro

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DeCobray stumbles out to the foyer, finds the two Securit Guards dead, and quickly picks up a phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Security Guard in the guard shed puts down his phone glances at the oncoming Scarab just as a Neo-Viper leans with his PULSE RIFLE and blasts the whole shed to pieces. The Scarab crashes right out the gate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the same time, the Brawler reaches the laboratory and there's a split second where both sides see each other in their windows. Duke and Ana lock eyes. Snake-Eyes and Sto Shadow do the same.

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: That's them! Snake-Eyes is already moving, lunging out a SIDE DOOR ont the street as the Brawler still moves, running right at t Scarab which turns to get away. Scarlett immediately foll him out, landing in a roll with her accelerator suit. Ana leans out of her window and fires her PULSE PISTOLS a the Brawler, keeping Duke and Rip inside. Then she fires Snake-Eyes and Scarlett. Snake-Eyes dives, but the blasts nail Scarlett. She crashes hard. Snake-Eyes glances at he

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Keep going! With that, he leaps after the Scarab, just grabbing the b of the vehicle as it tears away. The Brawler stops right next to Scarlett, out of breath, her accelerator suit FRITZING.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (to Duke and Ripcord) Don't worry about me, go and help Snake-Eyes! Duke doesn't need to be told twice. He leaps out and runs after the Scarab. Rips starts to follow, Breaker grabs hi

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: Careful. They're worth millions of dollars... each.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Millions of dollars, got it. He promptly trips and crashes to the pavement. Picks hims up. Gets hit by a car. Picks himself up again.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (to Driver) Sorry! Excusem moil (to a stunned Breaker) Won't happen again.
Then Rip hauls-ass after Duke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An ACCORDIAN BUS passes casually through an intersection. All of a sudden, the Scarab bursts through it, ripping it two and barrelling on down the busy street. Snake-Eyes is still barely clinging to the back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Breaker watches the two halves of the bus whirl around on SATELLITE VIEW as Heavy Duty drives through the city stre

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: Christ, they just shot right through a bus!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Duke and Rip charge after the Scarab. Their speedometers reading 15mph...then 30mph...then 40mph. they leap over a around speeding cars and trucks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Scarab smashes through any vehicle in its path, leavi trail of destruction for Duke and Ripcord to leap over or dart around in their suits. Ana and Storm Shadow hear Sna Eyes on the roof and drop their windows and lean out and shoot at him. But Snake-Eyes quickly clambers down the si of the vehicle, escaping their shots by disappearing bene the undercarriage. And that's when Ana sees Duke and Rip following. She sits back down inside and keys a button on a console. SIDE PANELS slide open on the outside of the Scarab to re two MISSILES, one on each side. They fire. The MISSILES streak back towards Duke and Ripcord. No tim to get out of the way, they dive and roll in various directions, extreme kinetic energy hurling them forward. two missiles whip between them and detonate, one on a PAR OFFICER'S CAR and the other on a BILLBOARD. The EXPLOSION from the car knocks them down. The Scarab tears away arou a corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They see Snake-Eyes on their monitors in the Brawler.

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: They're turning the corner. Go through that building at 6 o'clock!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Duke and Ripcord see the building in front of them.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: There's no door!

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER'S VOICE
dialogues.text: Make one! Duke charges directly at the building. Ripcord reluctantl following as Duke smashes through the wall into...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A crowded bar. Neither of them slow for a second. Duke bolts through. Rip grabs a MARTINI, opens his visor, down the drink, then places the empty glass on the tray of a stunned waitress. Behind her a sign reads: "DRINK RESPONSIBLY". Duke and Ripcord SMASH through the opposite wall...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .back out onto the city streets where they turn and level their WRIST-MOUNTED ROCKETS at...nothing. A puzzling beat And then the Scarab thunders up behind them at full speed Ripcord dives out of the way just in time. Duke has no su luck. He spins and catches the FRONT GRILL, digging his f into the road in an attempt to slow the Scarab down. But Scarab now angles towards a busy intersection, threatenin crush DUKE in the criss-crossing traffic. Duke throws himself onto the hood just as an SUV CRASHES the front grill and is chucked away like so much garbage. Duke tumbles up onto the roof. A PULSE CANNON pops up. Du dives off the back as the weapon fires. He tumbles to the pavement as Ripcord speeds up to him, firing his WRIST- MOUNTED ROCKETS at the Scarab. Duke fires with him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their rockets nail the Scarab and knock out the PULSE CAN BOOM! But its armor saves the vehicle. INSIDE: Storm Shadow and Ana are knocked around. Storm Shadow pops a hatch and grabs one of their own ACCELERATO SUITS. Hands it to Ana.

dialogues.speaker: STORM SHADOW
dialogues.text: Mr. McCullen would be quite unhappy if I let you die. Ana quickly and nervously starts to buckle in.

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: How thoughtful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the monitors, Scarlett and Breaker watch the Scarab vi Snake-Eyes speeding through the streets.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Look at the moves they're making, they're heading somewhere. Breaker widens the map, plotting a route.

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: This's their route from the lab. On the screen, they see the lab, the current position of Scarab, and what lies just ahead. . .the Eiffel Tower.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: (REALIZING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Metal... Oh God...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snake-Eyes is now desperately clinging to the undercarria Duke and Rip are catching up behind him.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT'S VOICE
dialogues.text: Guys, you have to stop them.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Yeah, we're working on it.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT'S VOICE
dialogues.text: I mean right now. They're going to detonate one of the warheads on the Eiffel Tower. Ripcord glances up and sees the Eiffel Tower looming up f

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Oh, man... Under the Scarab, Snake-Eyes pulls out his GLOCK PISTOL a fires into the unprotected insides of the FRONT TIRES, wh promptly rip to shreds. The Neo-Viper loses control of th vehicle, SMASHES through a GUARD ARM onto train tracks. Snake-Eyes sees something, lets go, rolls free and crashe into garbage cans just as a METRO TRAIN barrels into the Scarab, which LAUNCHES into the air, hood-over-tailpipe. Duke and Ripcord are running too fast to stop. Duke manag to leap into the air, his boots barely scraping the top o the train while Ripcord covers his face with his hands an PLUNGES headlong into a window on the side of the train..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .flying across the aisle, whipping past a group of stunne morning COMMUTERS, and smashing out through the far windo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Scarab, Duke and Rip all CRASH HARD to the pavement a tumble. Sparks and flame and flying metal everywhere. Duk and Rip finally stop tumbling, a hundred yards away from wreck of the Scarab.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scarlett, Heavy Duty and Breaker see this on their monito

dialogues.speaker: HEAVY DUTY/BREAKER
dialogues.text: Holy shit...

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: (CRINGING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Duke and Ripcord's visors lift, both looking a bit wigged

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: What happened to you?

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: I went through the train. What happened to you?

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: I jumped over it.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: You can do that?

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Yeah, you didn't know? INSIDE THE SCARAB: We see the Neo-Vipers are dead. Storm Shadow is incredibly beat and bloody, but Ana is just fin her red Accelerator Suit. Storm Shadow grabs the weapons case and he and Ana leap out. Duke and Ripcord pick themselves up while Snake-Eyes craw out of the TRASH CANS nearby. They see Storm Shadow and A emerge from the Scarab and hurry off towards the tower.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: C'mon! Snake-Eyes follows Duke and Ripcord, charging after them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HUNDREDS OF TOURISTS swarm around the south base of the t to buy their tickets and start their tours. Storm Shadow Ana burst through them, slamming past SECURITY GUARDS as bound onto the stairs. People scream at the sight of Ana. Duke and Ripcord arrive seconds later, rushing up in thei Accelerator Suits like beings from another world. They sp Ana and Storm Shadow on the stairs and hurry after them. Security Guards draw their pistols and start SHOOTING at and Ripcord. The BULLETS ping off their suits.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: (to Duke) How do you say "we're the good guys" in French? Meanwhile, Snake-Eyes evades all the chaos by leaping up under the south base, scaling the iron lattice like a mon

ON THE FIRST FLOOR: Ana and Storm Shadow crest the stairs and rudely push through the crowd to the stairway on the opposite side of the floor. Another SECURITY GUARD draws gun on them but Storm Shadow snatches the weapon out of t man's hands, swatting him with the butt, all without miss a step. The crowd panics and runs screaming for the stair --where Duke and Ripcord are struggling to catch up. The avalanche of tourists slows their progress. Underneath th stairway, however, Snake-Eyes continues to climb fast wit a safety net. He makes it to the first floor and races af Ana and Storm Shadow. ON THE GROUND: The Brawler screeches up. Scarlett's first out with Breaker and Heavy Duty behind her. All of them carrying weapons. The Security Guards instantly go on the defensive as they hurry up to the stairway. Guns go up. Scarlett speaks to them urgently in French.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: (French, subtitled) Don't shoot! We're a special anti- terrorist unit! There's a bomb up there! POLICE CARS are now rushing up behind them. ON THE SECOND FLOOR: Ana and Storm Shadow speed over to t main tower ELEVATOR and barge their way inside. Storm Sha hurls the ELEVATOR OPERATOR out as Ana opens the weapons and removes one of the NANOTECH WARHEADS and its KILL SWI Through the stunned crowd, they see Snake-Eyes reach the of the stairs behind. Ana rolls the warhead towards him while Storm Shadow lines up on him with the Security Guar pistol as if to shoot him. Snake-Eyes glares defiantly at Storm Shadow who just grins and lowers his gun at the warhead. A SINGLE SHOT AND THE WARHEAD EXPLODES. Snake-Eyes recoil ON THE GROUND: Everyone hears the warhead detonate. ON THE FIRST FLOOR: Duke and Ripcord freeze. ON THE SECOND FLOOR: A BURST OF NANO-MITES spreads out in all directions. Storm Shadow closes the ELEVATOR DOORS an hits a button for the top. The elevator races upwards as everything else gets eaten by the ravenous NANO-MITES. Th floor begins to disappear. Tourists stampede towards the stairs. A LITTLE GIRL is thrown from her MOTHER'S GRIP. T mother screams out for her child as the girl goes over th railing.

ON THE FIRST FLOOR: a hundred feet up, Duke and Rip see h coming. Ripcord swings out and catches the girl just in time. Above them, the tower is dissolving before their ey Duke sees Snake-Eyes being pushed down the stairs by the tourists. He leaps up onto the iron lattice.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Where you going?

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Each warhead has a kill switch.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: It's too late! We gotta get off this thing!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Those nano-mites will level the entire city! Duke climbs up the side of the tower with his Accelerator Suit. Rip things about following, but then looks at the little girl in his arms, who smiles and hugs him. Snake-E grabs him and they join the flow of people down the stair The NANO-MITES chasing them close behind. Below them, Scarlett, Breaker, and Heavy Duty are helping the police evacuate the Tower. INSIDE THE ELEVATOR: Ana and Storm Shadow race to the top

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: (into mike) Be ready to pick up in thirty seconds. IN THE SKIES: The Typhoon gunship rockets towards the top the disintegrating Eiffel Tower, its SIDE DOOR opening. ON THE TOWER: Duke scales the tower, the NANO-MITES chasi him up. His eyes on the elevator as it reaches the top de just above him. The Typhoon fires a blast of its CONCUSSI CANNONS at Duke, knocking him off the tower. He falls, bu manages to catch the tower just below, the NANO-MITES alm on top of him now. The climbs even faster. ON THE TOP DECK: The elevator arrives. Ana and Storm Shad calmly walk out and climb the railing as the Typhoon hove up beside them. Below them, Duke sees them board. The tow groans and wobbles. It's a long way down. Time has run ou Ana and Storm Shadow jump into the Typhoon.

With the NANO-MITES at his heels, Duke clambers up and ju up off the side of the Tower, sailing up through the air latching onto the SIDE DOOR of the Typhoon. IN THE TYPHOON: The gunship rocks with his sudden weight. Ana and Storm Shadow almost lose their footing. Duke spri inside. He smacks Storm Shadow down and grabs the KILL SWITCH from Ana, pressing the trigger. Immediately, the NANO-MITES pulse with light and fall to ground around the Eiffel Tower. The Tower groans, half-eaten, then topples over on its si Ripcord and Snake-Eyes scurry out of the way as it crashe down onto the Seine, sending up an enormous explosion of water. The shock on the faces of everyone around reverberates through the entire Joe team. Ripcord keeps h eyes on the Typhoon as it pulls away. Breaker suddenly ge an idea.

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: Come on! He hauls-ass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ana looks at Duke, a pursed smile on her lips.

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: You just saved Paris. Storm Shadow is not happy at all, he TASERS Duke, who dro hard to the floor of the Typhoon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A crowd has gathered around the crashed Scarab. Heavy Dut yanks one of the dead Neo-Vipers out. Breaker yanks off t guy's HELMET then removes a needle-like PORT PLUG from hi SURVEILLANCE SUIT. Scarlett moves into position to help h Ripcord kneels down.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: Plugging into his cerebral cortex. With a SICKENING CRUNCH, Breaker plunges the needle into top of the Neo-Viper's head. Ripcord winces at the sight.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: The brain survives for a couple of minutes after death. We can read his most recent memories.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Can you find Duke?

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: If this guy remembers the way home we can. INSERT: A FLASH OF MEMORIES appearing on Breaker's HUD. Duke shooting him in the face, racing along the highway, driving the ARMORED CAR. As the images continue, we PUSH on the Neo-Viper's open eyes and CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McCullen watching Breaker and Ripcord through the dead Ne Viper's eyes on a screen. He turns to the Doctor urgently

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: Destroy that unit immediately. The Doctor removes his PDA and taps a key to draw up the Viper's file. He clicks a button that reads "TERMINATE".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Instantly, the Neo-Viper's body snaps rigid and begins to shake. Everyone gets a shock. Backing up.

dialogues.speaker: HEAVY DUTY
dialogues.text: He's still alive!

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: He's not alive.

dialogues.speaker: HEAVY DUTY
dialogues.text: You ever seen a dead guy do that?

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: They activated a self-destruct. The Neo-Viper's body starts to decay before them. Thousan of NANO-MITES literally eating away at his flesh and bone

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: Nano-mites!

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: They're eating him!

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Hurry, Breaker! But the NANO-MITES are too fast. The Neo-Viper's legs are now gone. His chest and arms next. Breaker rapidly scans through the MEMORY FLASHES. But now the NANO-MITES consum his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McCullen watches Breaker's frantic face suddenly disappea his screen. He gives the Doctor a smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Breaker looks crestfallen at the empty Neo-Viper suit in arms. Ripcord kneels beside him, stunned and bereft.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: You did the best you could.

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: Relax, I got it.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: You got it? (CONFUSED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, what was the "NOO!" for?

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: That was for McCullen. There is the sound of weapons being raised. The team look to see they are surrounded by FRENCH POLICE and PARATROOP

dialogues.speaker: FRENCH SWAT CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: (in French) Put your hands in the air! The Joes trade looks, shrug and raise their hands.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: (under his breath) We don't have time for this.
SCARLETT It's agains friendly for t orders to engage with ces.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: The onl about i Dukendly force I care

dialogues.speaker: S
dialogues.text: Ripcord suddenly S Forces' heads. Some hit the PRAYS a burst of crashes through t deck. gunfire over the French to grab him , he French line. Ripcord charges , and though A DOZEN PARATR forward, AND he fights, they take OOPERS OPERS manage WE SMASH CUT TO: A him down hard. The Joes sit alone FRENCH POLICE HOLDING CEL

dialogues.speaker: L
dialogues.text: who bears some bruisbenches. Heavy fight.DutY stares at Ripcord,

dialogues.speaker: HEAVY DUTY
dialogues.text: Nice.

dialogues.speaker: ARLETT
dialogues.text: It'snot his emotional. fault. He's just... Scarlett and a French Detect Rip share a look. On the other SUIT o curiously examines n a desk. Bre aker jumps up to Breakerssde Rf the bars the bars. Please, BREAKER touch that. Please, don't

dialogues.speaker: HE'S
dialogues.text: touching It's very... Okayit. , Please! Sir. Sir, How do RIPCORD you say "lawyer" in French?

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: If we could get on a Might be to computer we longitude able Input the partial les g es latitude, and Viper, figu the downloaded from tha t re out their locati

dialogues.speaker: HEAVY DUTY
dialogues.text: (to Ripcord) It'll be a military when they're done tribunal. need a lawyer. We with us And 'll need diapers.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: (to himself) Think, think, think... (to the Joes) At some point they gotta feed us or take us out for the interrogation. When they do I'll jump the lead Guard. Heavy, you go for his weapon and--

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: --Start an international incident.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: I'm not gonna just sit here!

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: This is bigger than Duke.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: What if it was one of you? What if they had Heavy or Scarlett, what would you do? The Joes trade looks - rock and a hard place.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: We're not doing Duke a damned bit of good sitting here. If it was reversed, Duke would be kicking down every door between here and the freakin' moon 'til he found me.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: And we'll do the same for him as soon as we get out of here. She has a thought and turns to Breaker.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Partial? You said partial latitude and longitude.

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: We only got the one coordinate-- 90 degrees, then the image went to snow.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Maybe it was the whole coordinate, just 90 degrees latitude. (they all look at her) (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Before the image went to snow,...it's the polar ice cap. RIP'S DOG TAGS hit the floor and slide to his feet. The J all look up to see several POLICE OFFICIALS looking at th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joes are led down a hallway.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: They did away with the guillotine, right? They arrive at a door. The door is opened to reveal a man a wheelchair, back turned. When he spins around, it's Haw

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: General! Hawk just shakes his head and sighs heavily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joes sit around the General, mid-discussion.

dialogues.speaker: HEAVY DUTY
dialogues.text: How long before we're released?

dialogues.speaker: HAWK
dialogues.text: The French government is allowing you to leave on the condition that none of you ever return. Other agencies will be handling this from here on.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT/RIPCORD
dialogues.text: What?!

dialogues.speaker: HAWK
dialogues.text: The heads of state of every member of GI JOE are recalling their operatives. We are now considered a rogue unit, uncontrollable. Shut down. We're to report to Washington for debriefing. Hawk rolls his wheelchair to the door.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: That's it? They've got Duke!
Hawk stops his wheelchair, turns to them.

dialogues.speaker: HAWK
dialogues.text: I said you were to report to Washington. I didn't say when, or which route to take.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Maybe a northern one. Hawk smiles and wheels out the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A NIGHT RAVEN rockets through the orange skies, SMASHING through the sound barrier with an ear-tingling SONIC BOOM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Storm Shadow sits in a meditative state. Duke is shackled hands bound, out of his ACCELERATOR SUIT. Ana steps out o the cockpit area and approaches him, nods to Storm Shadow

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: He thinks I should kill you.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Why don't you?

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: James wants to meet you in person.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: James?

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: Mr McCullen.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Ana listen--

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: --Talk softly, or he'll tazer you again.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: (raises his bound hands) Loosen these, he'll never taser anything again. She taps the bonds on his wrists.

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: I should've thought of this before. They almost share a smile.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Let me get this straight. You're with McCullen. You're married to that Baron. And you claim you're still in love with me.

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: I'm a complex woman.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Maybe you just don't know who you are anymore.

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: Who I was died long ago.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: No, this isn't you, I still see the person I loved behind your eyes. Her eyes soften for a moment.

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: Tell me what she was like.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: She was smart, and funny. She was loyal as hell. She loved those she was close with, me, her brother... (agonized pause) I did my best. With Rex. I'm sorry. He was my responsibility. I should have... It's why I left, Ana. Why I couldn't be with you. You were in so much pain... I thought the sight of me just give you more. She seems to be affected by this ever so slightly, then.. hard, cold look comes to her eyes, she shakes her head.

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: It doesn't matter now.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: No, it matters very much. We have the chance to make things right.

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: Nothing will ever be right again. Duke stares at her, his heart ripped apart. WE PUSH IN ON the two of them and FLASHBACK TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rain is drizzling on a military cemetery. Ana sits alone, without family, without Duke, staring straight ahead as R casket is lowered into the ground. Parked on a nearby road is a lone car. Duke sits inside i staring at the funeral in the distance. His face tells us the anguish he's living with. He pulls out and starts to drive away, the rain on the windshield BLURS AS WE DISSOL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Night Raven zeroes down on a stretch of ice near a hu CAVE. A SET OF RUNWAY LIGHTS appear under the ice, guidin it in for a smooth landing. The cave swallows the plane whole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Night Raven rolls to a stop inside the cave. The side door opens. Storm Shadow exits with the weapons case. Ana leads Duke out, two Neo-Vipers behind them. Storm Shadow clicks a hand held remote and a HIDDEN ICE WALL opens to reveal a HI-TECH DIVING BELL awaiting them. Duke uses the moment to lunge forward, grab the case and haul ass towar the cave door. Storm Shadow spins, Shurikan throwing star in his hands. The Neo-Vipers whip up their pulse rifles.

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: NO! McCullen has plans for him! Storm Shadow throws a star, it whistles across the cave a nails Duke in his shoulder, Duke goes down hard, staggers back up, but the Neo-Vipers are already on him, they star beating the living shit out of him. Ana jogs up.

dialogues.speaker: ANA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Enough! Storm Shadow picks up the case and looks at Duke, face do bloody and beaten.

dialogues.speaker: STORM SHADOW
dialogues.text: And what was your plan? Run three thousand miles across the ice? He rips his star out of Duke's shoulder. Duke sucks it up

dialogues.speaker: STORM SHADOW, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Stupid soldier. Duke rolls over and stares up at them, breathing hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ripcord, Scarlett, Snake-Eyes, Heavy Duty and Breaker are the conn tower of a next-gen submarine, going over a 3-D of the polar ice cap.

dialogues.speaker: HEAVY DUTY
dialogues.text: That's a lotta ice.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: It's gonna be like trying to find whale spit in the ocean. Breaker sees a SMALL LIGHT flashing on his Ball-Eyepiece.

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: That's strange.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: When they stole the weapons case, I set my suit to scan for the tracker beacon in case it came back on, and it just came back on. Ripcord just smiles.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: That's my boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The DIVING BELL comes shooting down out of a shaft in the bottom of the ice cap and rockets down towards the facili

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the diving bell descends, Duke stares at the facility the portal. He is awed by the immense size of the place, looks at Ana, proud of her office.

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: Certain work needs to be done away from the public eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The diving bell entry port opens, guarded by two Neo-Vipe McCullen stands waiting. His eyes first move to the weapo case in Storm Shadow's hands. Storm Shadow opens it and shows him the three remaining warheads. McCullen runs his fingers over them, then nods, Storm Shadow closes the cas

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: Take them to the drones. I want them ready to launch in one hour.

dialogues.speaker: STORM SHADOW
dialogues.text: It will be done. And only then does McCullen greet Ana.

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: My beautiful Lady of the Lake... He kisses her. Ana kisses him back with slightly-feigned affection, her eyes open and on Duke. Duke stands there, impassive. McCullen finishes the kiss and turns to Duke.

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: This bother you? Duke says nothing, so McCullen steps closer.

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Isn't it funny, with the entire balance of power in the world about to shift, a couple of guys can still have a stare down over who gets the girl. Duke takes the opportunity to HEAD BUTT McCullen. The Neo Vipers instantly pummel Duke to the floor. McCullen wipes small trickle of blood from his nose.

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: The interesting thing about my Neo- Vipers is they still think the same thoughts they always did, they just can't act on them anymore. Instead, they do what I want. I imagine that must be very frustrating. He gets right down in Duke's face.

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I'm going to make you very unhappy.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: (grit teeth) I'm already happy. McCullen glances at Ana, watching the display with confli eyes. McCullen heads for the door, beckoning the Neo-Vipe to make Duke follow him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Duke trails behind McCullen and Ana, flanked by Neo-Viper

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: What're you gonna do with the warheads?

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: You take to your training well, that's good. Still trying to develop information. Still planning to escape and stope me. Moments from now, you'll see that won't ever happen.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Then you won't mind telling me.

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: Isn't it clear? I'm a business man. I'm going to use them.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Millions of people are gonna die if you launch those warheads. What is it you want, McCullen?

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: Merely to strike fear into the hearts of every man, woman, and child on the planet. Only then will they look up to the man who wields the most power, and obey him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The control room is alive with TECHNICIANS squirreling ab various stations. Monitors show three large AERIAL DRONES sitting in vertical launch bays. Duke sees the drones and face registers the horror of what McCullen's about to do. glances at Ana, she quietly looks away, a hint of remorse her eyes? The Doctor rises to greet McCullen, glancing at Duke for several moments, as if struck by the sight of hi

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: Meet the genius behind all my nanotechnology.

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR
dialogues.text: My genius lies only in taking what others created to the logical next steps. All modern gains in science are made through theft.

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: You'll have to excuse his modesty, when I found him, he was --

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR
dialogues.text: (interrupting, re: Duke) --Another "recruit"?

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: Albeit a rather unwilling one. The Doctor's nano-mites can control all manner of brain functions. When you wake up, you'll be working for me, and your past will be a distant shimmer that floats in and out of your mind like a leaf on a breeze.

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR
dialogues.text: I'll prepare him for the surgery. The Doctor beckons the Neo-Vipers who shove Duke after hi towards another door. Duke and Ana exchange one last look McCullen keeps his eyes on her as she watches him go.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: A school of fish swims past the facility, one fish breaks away from the school. CAMERA ZOOMS IN TIGHT ON IT: it's n fish at all, but a mini robotic underwater spy system.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A sleek submarine drifts silently through the arctic wate

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Picture's coming on line now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the Conn Tower of the sub, our team gathers around Bre who sits at a monitor watching what the "fish" is watchin

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: It's an underwater facility...

dialogues.speaker: HEAVY DUTY
dialogues.text: McCullen's home away from home.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Dukes' gotta be in there somewhere.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Wait, what's that? Breaker ZOOMS IN on a massive TURBO-LASER CANNON.

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: Oh, Jesus...That's an automated, phased array turbo-pulse battery. (off their looks) A really big gun.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Could it take out our sub?

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: That thing could take out a dozen subs simultaneously.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Then that's our first objective.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: No, no. Duke's our first objective.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: The main force can't attack as long as that cannon's online.

dialogues.speaker: HEAVY DUTY
dialogues.text: How you figure getting it offline? Snake-Eyes points to the DIVING BELL CABLES n the monitor

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Elevator cables. They've got a surface entrance. Shipwreck? She turns to the submarine commander, HECTOR "SHIPWRECK" DELGADO, a fiery Spanish naval combat veteran.

dialogues.speaker: SHIPWRECK
dialogues.text: Going up, senorita? Scarlett nods and leads the others down a corridor.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Snake-Eyes, Breaker, Ripcord, and I will infiltrate the factory from above and destroy the cannon. Heavy D, as soon as we give the word, you lead the assault from outside.

dialogues.speaker: HEAVY DUTY
dialogues.text: (nods grimly) Go, Joes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A quiet wind blows across a remote stretch of arctic ice. of a sudden the ice pack begins to tremble like the mothe all earthquakes. It cracks and ruptures and then erupts a the CONN TOWER of the submarine crashes through, then gri to a halt. A FORWARD HATCH OPENS and two ROCK SLIDES laun out, landing hard on the ice and speeding away. Ripcord a Breaker on one. Scarlett and Snake-Eyes on the other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McCullen, Ana, and Storm Shadow watch monitors showing TECHNICIANS securing the warheads onto three rocket prope SMART-DRONES. As the last one is secured a Technician say

dialogues.speaker: TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: All drones prepared and ready, Sir.

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: Good, commence the launch sequence immediately. is that a ripple of concern flickering across Ana's face?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our team races into the ice cave on their ROCK SLIDES and park beside the dormant Night Raven. Weapons up. Scanning place from top to bottom. Ripcord stars at the awesome pl towering before him.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: That McCullen's got some gadgets. Breaker gestures to the ice wall. Snake-Eyes uses his Kat sword to slice a circle in the wall and yank it out, revealing the DIVING BELL CABLES, but no diving bell.

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: Maybe we could slide down. Snake-Eyes shakes his head, doubtful

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: The arctic water would kill us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McCullen, Ana, and Storm Shadow watch the drones sitting the launch bays on the screens. Technicians are working h

dialogues.speaker: TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: Three... two... one... ignite primary engines. The entire control room begins to shake. The screens fill with fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joes run outside, wondering what the hell is causing earthquake. A large circle of ice near them MELTS. And th the first drone EXPLODES UP before them and LAUNCHES into morning sky, peeling away to the east. Before they can re the second drone EXPLODES UP a hundred yards away, peelin off to the west. They hear the third one about to rocket

Snake-Eyes thinks fast, sprints into the cave, jumps on a Rock Slide, hauls-ass outside, hits a WEAPONS SWITCH on h Rock Slide, prepping two HEAT-SEEKING ROCKETS on either s of the vehicle. The third drone LAUNCHES UP from two hund yards away. Snake-Eyes locks onto its exhaust and FIRES. missiles race up after the drone and knock it out of the It EXPLODES. Metal FLIES. Snow BURNS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The technicians see this on their monitors.

dialogues.speaker: TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: We lost one.

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: Lost one? What do you mean?

dialogues.speaker: TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: Bird Three is down, Sir. McCullen looks at the monitors, enraged. Storm Shadow smi

dialogues.speaker: STORM SHADOW
dialogues.text: We're under attack.

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: Alert all defences. Charge up the pulse cannon. He turns to say something to Ana, but she has left the ro

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Topside, the team watches the two remaining drones race a

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: What about the other two?

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: We find the kill switches and short out the nano-mites.

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: (shakes his head) They're already way out of range.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Then somebody has to go up there and shoot those things down.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: (PAUSE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ripcord climbs into the Night Raven's cockpit. Scarlett s up to watch. He's already flipping switches and putting o FLIGHT HELMET.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Can you even fly this thing?

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: I can fly anything. You just track those warheads and guide me in. We don't have long until they hit.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Ripcord? He glances at her, a moment between them. Then she presse forward and kisses him on the mouth. He stares back at he

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Good luck.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Do me a favor? Save Duke. She gives him a nod, then leaves. Ripcord grins to himsel

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The NIGHT RAVEN tears across the ice and launches into th sky. Ripcord WHOOPS with adrenaline. Scarlett, Snake-Eyes and Breaker fast rope down into the first launch bay as t ice REFORMS behind them, hiding the hole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We now find Duke, wearing only SURGICAL TROUSERS, strappe the operating gurney we saw Zartan on earlier. The SMART ROBOTS warming up around him as the Doctor approaches.

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR
dialogues.text: The atomic bomb that was dropped on Hiroshima destroyed seventy percent of the city. Seventy percent... Did you know that, Duke?
Duke looks at him, something familiar.

dialogues.speaker: REX
dialogues.text: There was a bank situated less than one hundred yards from Ground Zero, destroyed of course. Only one thing survived. It's four bank vaults. And when those vaults were opened, they discovered everything inside them had survived completely unscathed.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Who are you?

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR
dialogues.text: Of course, the vault I took shelter in wasn't that well-made. He unclips his BREATHING TUBES and lowers the mask to rev a scarred and burned face.

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Double Bubble? Duke is beyond shocked.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Rex... Rex immediately has trouble breathing and returns the mas over his face.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You sonuvabitch... Ana buried you.

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR
dialogues.text: A moving ceremony, I'm sure. The three volley salute. The flag on the coffin.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Why? .Why didn't you come in...?

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR
dialogues.text: Because I found out the truth...

dialogues.speaker: AND WE FLASHBACK TO
dialogues.text: Rex moves through the building with Fireteam Bravo.

dialogues.speaker: BRAVE SOLDIER
dialogues.text: Intel says the lab's in the basement. Fireteam Bravo kicks open a door. They lead the way down staircase toward the basement. Rex follows, nervous as he The soldiers round a corner, suddenly, Rex hears GUNFIRE, freezes, then silence, Rex pulls out his .45 And rounds t corner to see Fireteam Bravo down. A GUARD is trying to c a jam in his machine gun. As he clears the weapon and rai it, Rex raises his .45 and fires first. The Guard drops. Rex checks Bravo, but they're not moving. He looks around basement, no lab, but he sees a massive VAULT DOOR, close He heads for the vault, 45 raised, breathing hard. WHOOSH blast of refrigerated air hits him as he opens the door. Rex enters a small room filled with DEAD ANIMALS in huge FORMALDEHYDE JARS> Something inside the animals is consta reshaping their appearances, reforming their facial bones changing the color, texture and elasticity of their skins There is a scuffling noise, Rex points his gun. A small, stooped old SCIENTIST in a lab coat appears.

dialogues.speaker: SCIENTIST
dialogues.text: Are you going to shoot me?... Rex doesn't respond.

dialogues.speaker: SCIENTIST, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: We knew you were coming. But I couldn't walk away from it... Rex stares in awe, not what he was expecting.

dialogues.speaker: REX
dialogues.text: Stay where you are. His gun up, he finds a COMPUTER TERMINAL and begins acces various files, starts reading them.

dialogues.speaker: REX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: These aren't chemical or nuclear--

dialogues.speaker: SCIENTIST
dialogues.text: No. Something much... better.

dialogues.speaker: RES
dialogues.text: This is beyond anything... This is light years ahead of anyone in the field.

dialogues.speaker: SCIENTIST
dialogues.text: You see why I couldn't leave. Rex nods, hypnotized by the science in front of him, an instant bond formed with the man who created it. The dist sound of Jets. The Scientist moves to the vault door and begins pulling it closed as we hear the J-Dam Bunker Bust whistling towards them.

dialogues.speaker: SCIENTIST, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: If we live, I'll show you everything...

dialogues.speaker: WE SMASH CUT BACK TO THE MEDICAL WING
dialogues.text: Duke tries to absorb what he's learned. The Doctor contin

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR
dialogues.text: The man who created this technology was not our enemy. In fact, he was hired by our very own government to create it. When it was deemed too unethical, they sent us to kill him. He didn't survive the blast. But I... lived. (touches his face) And I escaped with his research. Unfortunately I tested it on myself first, and lost my lungs and vocal chords in the process. But now I've perfected it, and you will get a first-hand experience.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: (his biggest concern) Does Ana know about this, about you?

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR
dialogues.text: No... and she never will. He glances at the SMART ROBOTS and Duke realizes.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: You sick bastard... you did this to your own sister?

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR
dialogues.text: (INCENSED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I loved my sister! Do you have any idea the state she was in? Me dead. You AWOL. Depression, drugs. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: So, I had her brought here, gave her a way to deal with her pain, gave her purpose. Made her strong. I gave her a new life, Duke.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Why work for McCullen?

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR
dialogues.text: He saved my life, for starters. Now to mention infinite resources to work in the field of my choosing.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: That's bullshit. You could have had any job you wanted.

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR
dialogues.text: I didn't want any job. You can't play nice with science, Duke. It's sometimes necessary to experiment, to fail, even to destroy to attain a goal. It's a fact that McCullen has the guts to embrace.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: (still shocked) Everything she's done, everything she's become, started because she thought you died that day.

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR
dialogues.text: And because you then abandoned her, let's not forget that part. And with that, he leaves Duke to the SMART ROBOTS, which menacingly begin to move in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scarlett, Snake-Eyes, and Breaker drop down into the laun bay. They see a chrome corridor leading into the facility

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: It's pressure plated and laser protected. Anyway around it?

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: No. Any object larger than a quarter will fry your britches. Snake-Eyes shakes his head with a sigh, then steps forwar and leaps onto the floor, landing on his fingertips.

Then, with incredible strength, he proceeds to walk acros the floor on his fingertips, aware of the continuous crac and hum of lasers around him. Scarlett and Breaker watch baited breath. Snake- Eyes now reaches the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What you'll have to do is rewire the laser panel's brain by-- --Snake-Eyes swiftly balances on one set of fingertips wh his other fingers grab his sword and STAB the laser panel The sound of the laser net instantly vanishes.

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: .or you cold just stab it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Duke lies on the operating table as a SMART ROBOT makes a incision behind his right ear. Duke grimaces. A long need zeroes in on the incision. As the needle dives towards Du head, a hand hits a switch and the needle quickly retract Duke looks over to see Ana by the controls, gazing at him

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: I don't have much time. She rushes over and unties him and they stare at each oth then kiss passionately. All of a sudden, Duke feels somet behind her right ear, he turns her head, --an INCISION SC He looks at her, but before he can say anything, Ana's bo snaps rigid and falls limp in his arms.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Ana! Duke looks over to see the Doctor holding his PDA, McCull and two Neo-Vipers beside him, their rifles on Duke and A Duke gazes at Ana, desperately feeling for her pulse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two TECHNICIANS man the firing controls of the huge TURBO LASER CANNON. Snake-Eyes takes them out and shuts down th cannon. HE sends a quick message on his WRIST-COMMUNICATO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heavy Duty sees the message appear on a screen. "CANNON O LINE. HAVE A NICE DAY." Heavy smiles and turns to Shipwre

dialogues.speaker: HEAVY DUTY
dialogues.text: Let's get in this fight.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: The GI JOE submarine peels around a rocky headland now, i full view of the underwater facility. A series of TORPEDO fire out of the submarine's launch tubes. Most are blown by the facility's Harpoon Cannon defenses, but several ma to hit the facility's exterior. KA-BOOM!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The whole place SHUDDERS. Scarlett and Breaker blow the control room door and cut down the Technicians trying to shoot them. Breaker takes over a station console.

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: Okay, I've got a lock on the two remaining warheads. Target one is Moscow! Target Two is Washington!

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Give Ripcord the coordinates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snake-Eyes spins to see a pair of KATANA BLADES come cras down at him from behind. He spins, but one of the blades cuts him on his left arm, sending him reeling backwards, it's Storm Shadow. Who qui powers the laser cannon back online. Snake-Eyes dives to him, --and as their swords meet WE FLASH CUT TO: THE GROUNDS OF THE ARISHIKAGE TEMPLE, where two sixteen y olds, Snake-Eyes and Storm Shadow, trade blows with woode katanas. Storm Shadow drops Snake-Eyes, who falls hard, S Shadow steps on his throat, sword point in Snake- Eyes' f Hard Master looks on without expression. FLASH CUT BACK T THE CONTROL ROOM, where Snake-Eyes and Storm Shadow's bla flash like lightning, they battle fiercely around the roo Neo-Viper charges up the controls. Snake can't stop him.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: Outside, the massive TURBO-LASER swings wildly towards th submarine and fires. A BRILLIANT BLUE PULSE ripples throu the arctic sea, glancing the side of the vessel. WHAM!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The submarine shakes hard. Rivets burst. Water pours in.

dialogues.speaker: SHIPWRECK
dialogues.text: The hull's been ruptured!

dialogues.speaker: HEAVY DUTY
dialogues.text: Everyone into the attack boats!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hatches open along the sides of the submarine, deploying SHARC ATTACK CRAFT carrying dozens of Joes. At the same t batches begin to open on the facility and a dozen MANTIS attack craft carrying dozens of Neo-Vipers emerge.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: Heavy Duty and Shipwreck pilot one of the SHARCS. The hug opposing force coming at them is quite terrifying.

dialogues.speaker: HEAVY DUTY
dialogues.text: Keep tight everybody. He fires a HARPOON TORPEDO which BLASTS a Mantis. The man craft RETURN FIRE. The whole area explodes in a pulse fir and harpoon blasts. The Joe submarine sinks and EXPLODES the base of the facility.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Duke cuddles dead Ana, clearly emotional. McCullen steps

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: Is she still alive?

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR
dialogues.text: For now.

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: You said this couldn't happen.

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR
dialogues.text: I didn't think it could. I've never seen anyone defeat the programming, even momentarily. Duke recovers and angrily grabs one of Ana's PISTOLS and kills the two Neo-Vipers, then turns the gun on the other The Doctor lifts his PDA, finger on the "TERMINATE" BUTTO

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR, (CONT'D)
