dialogues.text: If I press this, Ana dies.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Put it down.

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR
dialogues.text: Your choice, Duke.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Put it down! The Doctor doesn't move. McCullen watches the stand-off h right hand discreetly drawing STEEL HOSE out from his sle

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ripcord streaks into the upper atmosphere in the Night Ra the curve of the Earth visible out his windows. Ahead, he see a PULSATING LIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: I see it, dead ahead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Breaker speaks into his headset.

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: You have to knock it down before it re-enters the atmosphere so the nano-mites don't reach the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ripcord flicks a switch and opens a PULSE LASER on the no

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Uh, I've got a problem. The fire controls are not in here.

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER'S VOICE
dialogues.text: What do you mean, not in there?

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: I mean I can't see them anywhere!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scarlett hears this and realizes.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: It's gotta be voice-activated.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD'S VOICE
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: You have to say the words into your flight helmet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ripcord lines up the missile in his sights, gets a lock.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Fire! (nothing happens) Shoot! (still nothing) Blast away! Still nothing, the missile streaking onwards towards the Earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They hear Ripcord yelling over the speakers.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD'S VOICE
dialogues.text: Nothing's happening!

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: Must be a different language.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: (to Ripcord) Try "teine".

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD'S VOICE
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: It's Scottish for fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ripcord's not sure about this, the missile arcing down.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Teine.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Listen to my voice, "Teine".

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Teine! Teine! Teine! (nothing happens) It's not working!

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT'S VOICE
dialogues.text: That's because you're not saying it right!

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: How many different ways you want me to say it?

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT'S VOICE
dialogues.text: One way! The right way! Teine!

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Teine! And at last the PULSE LASER fires. Blasting the missile o of the sky. The CLOUD OF NANO-MITES floats aimlessly away

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all see the missile disappear on their screen.

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: Nice work, Ace. You just saved Moscow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ripcord sighs with relief, already peeling away.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Just doing my job. Guide me to the other drone... (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (under his breath) .man, I freakin' saved Moscow!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The White House glistens in the midday sun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The American President's Bodyguards rush him and his staf down into a fortified bunker beneath the White House.

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: How soon will it strike the city?

dialogues.speaker: STAFFER
dialogues.text: Seventeen minutes, Sir.

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: This will be a disaster the likes of which we have never seen. As the DOORS CLOSE behind them we see the MARS INDUSTRIES LOGO on the doors.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: Another blast from the TURBO-LASER destroys a SHARC.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: Heavy Duty sees this as he takes out a MANTIS.

dialogues.speaker: SHIPWRECK
dialogues.text: That cannon's going to kill us all.

dialogues.speaker: HEAVY DUTY
dialogues.text: My guy will take care of it, trust me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snake-Eyes kills the Neo-Viper, who falls down a large sh into freezing waters. Storm Shadow lunges at Snake-Eyes a the two of them tumble down into the shaft, but land on a gangway. They both leap up and begin to fight again. The Viper tries to crawl out of the freezing water, seemingly unfazed as he slowly freezes solid.

All of a sudden, there's LOUD NOISES and a series of ENER LASERS power on up and down the shaft between various cir modules. This is where the energy is charged to operate t cannon. One of the lasers catches Storm Shadow's shoulder burns him severely. Snake-Eyes sees this and ducks just a ENERGY LASER fires on beside his head.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: Outside, the TURBO-LASER fires. The Joe craft desperately weave and dodge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .and the LASER NET fades. Instantly, Storm Shadow and Sna Eyes continue their desperate fight. Swords FLASH and CLA two masters at their best. AND WE FLASH CUT TO: THE GROUNDS OF THE ARISHIKAGE TEMPLE, where two twenty-tw year olds, Storm Shadow and Snake-Eyes sword fight. Storm Shadow knocks Snake-Eyes to the ground again and places h steel sword against Snake-Eyes' face. Again, Hard Master watches without expression. AND WE FLASH CUT BACK TO: THE ENERGY SHAFT, where Storm Shadow slashes Snake-Eyes across the chest, but before he can finish him off, the cannon charges up again and the LASER NET slams on. Storm Shadow twists his body to avoid the ENERGY LASERS while S Eyes lifts himself up to his toes to avoid a laser that threatens to disintegrate his crotch. Storm Shadow sees t grins to himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A staffer is on the phone, looking up at the President.

dialogues.speaker: STAFFER
dialogues.text: It seems somebody's shot down the warhead heading for Moscow.

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: Thank God... As he says this, a SECRET SERVICE AGENT draws a SILENCED PISTOL and kills the other Agents and Staff. We see an INCISION SCAR behind his right ear and realize he is a Ne Viper. The President stares, stunned and horrified. The N Viper holds his pistol on the President as--
--A BOOKCASE moves on the wall, revealing a secret room. UNSEEN FIGURE emerges and the President stares in shock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Up in the skies, Ripcord spots the second drone rocketing down towards the lower atmosphere in front of him.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Second drone in my sights.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Breaker and Scarlett watch in the control room.

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: Hurry, Rip. You've only got thirty seconds before it enters the lower atmosphere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ripcord's feeling the pressure. He targets the missile.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Taine! But nothing happens. Scarlett's voice yells in his head.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT'S VOICE
dialogues.text: Teine! Teine!

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Don't yell at me!

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT'S VOICE
dialogues.text: Teine. Ripcord takes a breath, stealing his nerves. A RED FUEL L starts beeping on his control board. Rip does his best to ignore it, focusing on the missile as it begins to disapp into the lower atmosphere. The light beats faster and lou

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Teine! The LASER PULSE fires, blasting straight at the missile w is lost in the atmospheric haze below. For a moment, he c tell if he hit it or not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tracking in the control room provides the answer.

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: You missed! The warhead has entered the lower atmosphere!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ripcord realizes this as he enters the lower atmosphere himself. The spread of WASHINGTON D.C. Far below him now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the operating chamber, the stand-off reaches its boili point now. McCullen slowly approaching Duke who keeps Ana pistol on the Doctor, Ana still in Duke's arms.

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: Did you think she loved you?

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Stay back!

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: Did you imagine your life with her?

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: I said stay back!

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR
dialogues.text: Don't you know you've lost, Duke?

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: All I know is that neither of you deserves her. McCullen suddenly lifts the STEEL HOSE in his right hand- --A BURST OF FLAME tears out at Duke who reflexively fire the PULSE PISTOL at it. The intense air blast from the pu pistol catches the flames midway between them and blows t back onto McCullen. McCullen SCREAMS as his face is liter burned off. The Doctor freaks and drops the PDA, then yan McCullen out into the corridor. Duke fires after them, th grabs the PDA, removing Ana's screen with a sigh of relie

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Above Washington, Ripcord guns his aircraft after the fal drone. Getting real close this time. No way he can miss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They see this on the screens in the control room.

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: You're too close, Rip. Back up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ripcord gets eerily calm all of a sudden.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Actually, I think I'm just about close enough... (PAUSE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .teine. The PULSE LASER fires point blank. The missile EXPLODES r in front of him. Ripcord flies through the flames, the CL OF NANO-MITES latching onto his wings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The drone disappears from their screens now.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Ripcord? What happened? Rip!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ripcord is now struggling mightily with his controls as t NANO-MITES swiftly eat his plane. His FUEL LIGHT flashes at him alarmingly. He angles the N Raven upwards, giving it all he's got, NANO-MITES everywh

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They see his plane angle back up into the upper atmospher

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: He's taking the nano-mites back up into the upper atmosphere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Night Raven is breaking up all around Ripcord now. He quickly attaches his flight helmet's BREATHING MASK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ripcord turns the plane over, inverting it.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: Cur magh! The canopy explodes. Rip shoots back down into the atmosp as the NANO-MITES devour the Night Raven, then float away

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They see this on their screens.

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: He did it... He actually did it...

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Ripcord? Talk to me...Ripcord! Still nothing. And now they begin to suspect the worst. T

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD'S VOICE
dialogues.text: I asked you not to yell at me. Relief comes rushing back to Scarlett and Breaker.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: What happened? Are you okay?

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD'S VOICE
dialogues.text: Yeah, did it work?

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Yes...yes, it worked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ripcord smiles, parachuting down towards Washington.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: (into headset) Good...cause I think I'm about to get arrested.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ripcord lands on the White House lawn, holding his hands benignly as dozens of SECRET SERVICE AGENTS surround him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ENERGY LASERS pulse on again, almost catching the two nin in their fight. Snake-Eyes draws his KATANA SWORD, its bl shimmering in the laser-light as he redirects the laser b into its module. Storm Shadow does the same with his swor barely saving his neck. They glare at each other. AND WE FLASH CUT TO THE ARISHIKAGE TEMPLE, where the two year-olds fight with katanas. Storm Shadow presses forwar Snake-eyes side-steps and hurls Storm Shadow to the groun He steps up and puts his sword tip in Storm Shadow's eye. Snake-Eyes first ever win over Storm Shadow. Hard Master CLAPS ONE TIME. Storm Shadow looks at his fat he can't believe it, his father seems happy for Snake-Eye He slaps the sword away, gets up and stalks off. FLASH BACK TO: The cannon fires and the lasers disappear, freeing them to continue their duel. This is it. The fina duel. Snake-Eyes struggles, exhausted and wounded. Storm Shadow puts in every ounce of hate he has left. He finall tears Snake-Eyes' sword away and kicks him down. About to for the final kill. But before we find out the climax to their fight, we must finish their story: ON THE ARISHIKAGE TEMPLE GROUNDS, Snake-Eyes, still 26, w along the pond. He hears a LOUD CRY. Snake-Eyes breaks in run, careens around a building and sees Hard Master slump on the ground, a sword in his back.

dialogues.speaker: SNAKE-EYES
dialogues.text: Master! Other NINJAS come flooding in.

dialogues.speaker: NINJA
dialogues.text: That's Storm Shadow's sword!

dialogues.speaker: NINJA
dialogues.text: There! There's the murderer!

Snake-Eyes spins to see Storm Shadow climb up the side of Temple, onto the rood, give him a last look, and jump dow over the wall. FLASH BACK TO: THE ENERGY SHAFT where Snak Eyes is suddenly filled with renewed energy, he stares up Storm Shadow's katana blade poised for the final kill.

dialogues.speaker: STORM SHADOW
dialogues.text: You took your vow of silence to avenge our Master. But now you will die without a word. The LOUD NOISE gears up again, distracting Storm Shadow f just a beat. Snake-Eyes uses the moment to catch Storm sh with his feet, holding him up for a split second as the ENERGY LASERS come back on. One of them burns deeply acro Storm Shadow's neck, he SCREAMS and stumbles back and fal OVER THE EDGE and down into the freezing turgid waters. S Eyes steps up and looks down to see if he surfaces... He doesn't.

dialogues.speaker: SNAKE-EYES
dialogues.text: Father always feared it would come to this. EXPLOSIONS begin to rock the shaft now. Snake-Eyes stumbl towards the exit, leaving his fallen Sword Brother behind

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: Heavy Duty sees the cannon return to its dormant position

dialogues.speaker: HEAVY DUTY
dialogues.text: Turbo-laser is down! He guns his engines, firing at a MANTIS attack craft. It EXPLODES. Heavy Duty howls with delight. Around him, the Joes begin to turn the tide of the battle SERIES OF SHOTS of Mantis vehicles getting nailed by Joe harpoon cannons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They feel the EXPLOSIONS in the control room. Screens sho out. Water starts to cascade in through BURSTING RIVETS.

dialogues.speaker: BREAKER
dialogues.text: Energy overload in the phased array battery. Power subsystems are going critical.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Let's get out of here! Scarlett grabs Breaker by the scruff of the neck and haul him out of the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McCullen's face is horrifically burned as The Doctor help him down into the Trident. EXPLOSIONS blowing above them. pilots guide the sub out white the Doctor starts injectin McCullen with NANO-MITES. McCullen starts to SCREAM...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scarlett and Breaker races into the diving bell entry por and are shocked to find Snake-Eyes already here. Scarlett runs up and gently hugs him.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: Snake! Snake-Eyes grimaces, then looks Scarlett in the eyes.

dialogues.speaker: SNAKE-EYES
dialogues.text: .he's dead. She knows who he means, she gives him a grim smile. And that's when they see Duke, carrying Ana, charging up to t Another EXPLOSION makes them all dash into the diving bel The doors close and we hear them launch.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: Heavy Duty notices the Trident escaping out of the EXPLOD docking bay into the arctic water. He angles towards the

dialogues.speaker: HEAVY DUTY
dialogues.text: We got a runner! Cut him off! All of a sudden, the whole damn facility EXPLODES. INSIDE THE DIVING BELL: Our heroes are rocked by the BLAS then they see MASSIVE CHUNKS OF POLAR ICE plummet down fr the ice pack above, cutting off Heavy Duty and the Joes, DEMOLISHING the remainder of the facility. The Trident disappears behind the trillions of bubbles and falling ic

dialogues.speaker: INT/EXT. SHARC
dialogues.text: Shipwreck checks his targeting scanner.

dialogues.speaker: SHIPWRECK
dialogues.text: All other targets neutralized.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: The Trident is moving fast through the water somewhere.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: McCullen turns to us and we see that the NANO-MITES have created a FORM-FITTING MASK all over his face. He catches reflection in the portal and he grabs at the mask, the NA MITES twisting with the contours of his muscles to reveal complete and ever-lasting horror. He breaks down, falling the floor, then he recovers and looks up at The Doctor.

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: I guess I should thank you, Doctor. The Doctor is busy fiddling with his hand held PDA.

dialogues.speaker: THE DOCTOR
dialogues.text: I want you to call me... Commander. (looks at McCullen) And from now on, I'll be on a first name basis with you, Destro. McCullen's silver face goes blank.

dialogues.speaker: MCCULLEN
dialogues.text: Yes, Commander.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Duke watches Ana through a two-way mirror. She sits alone a holding cell. A MILITARY SCIENTIST watches her with Duk

dialogues.speaker: SCIENTIST
dialogues.text: Physically, she's fine. But without the correctly-coded kill frequency, we can't short them out.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: There's nothing you can do?

dialogues.speaker: SCIENTIST
dialogues.text: Only the man who put them in there has the correct code. Duke considers this carefully, staring at Ana.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Duke walks along a prison corridor with Ana, led by two PRISON GUARDS. She carries a small bundle of PRISON GEAR.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: I'll visit you.

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: I won't be here long.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: You'll be here for the rest of your life, Ana. She looks at him, her face softening.

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: Duke?

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: I'm here.

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: After all I've done, .you can't save me, .it's too late. A BEAT passes between them.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: I'll visit you. And for a moment, she appears to crack... but then a sinister smile creases her mouth.

dialogues.speaker: ANA
dialogues.text: You know, this has only just begun. She touches his face, then the PRISON BARS slam shut betw them. She holds his eyes a moment longer, then the two Pr Guards lead her away. Duke just watches her go, his face with pain. He walks off alone...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: General Hawk is in his wheelchair, still recovering from wounds. He leads Duke and ripcord to the Howler.

dialogues.speaker: HAWK
dialogues.text: With GI JOE reinstated, would you boys like to stay on awhile?

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: What do you say, Rip? Ripcord looks at Scarlett, who throws him a wink and a sm

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD
dialogues.text: I'm good. They all laugh. Rip steps up to her.

dialogues.speaker: RIPCORD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: So how do you feel about this?

dialogues.speaker: SCARLETT
dialogues.text: I feel very... emotional. Duke smiles and the Joes climb aboard as the platform ris

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A bevy of SECRETARIES and STAFFERS greets the President. he enters the Oval office and closes the door, alone, he looks around, walks behind the desk, and grins as he sits if this is the first time he's ever done this. With a lit flair, he CRACKS HIS KNUCKLES and we realize this is Zart And we SMASH CUT TO BLACK and ROLL CREDITS...
